participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a strong sense of independence.
participant_1.background: I love animals, but my favorite is the fox. I am proud of my ability to take care of myself and my cats. I love to read books. Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs. I've been single for a while now because I'm too focused on my career.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Artistic and introverted, enjoys hands-on activities and prefers intimate settings.
participant_2.background: I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands. I like to shop. I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing. I am the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco. I do not drink alcohol.

content.text: I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands. Do you have any hobbies?
I love reading books and I love animals. I painted a portrait of my two small dogs last year. What type of crafts do you like to do?
I like to do a lot of different crafts, but I'm really good at crocheting and knitting. I also like to sew, but I'm still learning.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to knit, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not that hard, you just have to practice. What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really like the Harry Potter series. I've read them all multiple times. What's your favorite craft project that you've ever done?
I think my favorite craft project was a blanket that I made for my mom. It took me a long time to make, but it was worth it.
That sounds really nice. I'm sure your mom loved it.
She did! She still uses it all the time.
That's great! I'm glad you were able to make something so special for your mom.
